wikitext.*:
'''Nardi''' was the name of a "flower-[[Fays|fairy]]" or a "flower-[[Valar#Other versions of the legendarium|Vala]]", according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Nar>{{PE|12}}, p. 68</ref> Nothing else is known about her, and she doesn't appear in any of the narratives.

== Etymology ==
The name ''Nardi'' is in [[Qenya]], being derived from the root [[NṚŘṚ]] ("smell sweet").<ref name=Nar/>
